backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing daily leaderboards, storing up to 100 sorted score entries per date with submit and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a UI color update to NumberMatrixView and associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files including pages, components, and puzzle modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes, plus global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/achievements/definitions.ts: Defines achievement metadata including IDs, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/achievements/engine.ts: Evaluates player performance to unlock achievements and persists unlocked IDs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, sync manager for queued score submissions, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main layout shell with header navigation, content outlet, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/Heatmap365.tsx: Renders a 365‑day activity heatmap with tooltips and status colors for each date.
frontend/src/game/dailyPuzzle.ts: Generates deterministic daily puzzles based on date seed, difficulty, and puzzle type selection.
frontend/src/game/difficulty.ts: Stores difficulty level, computes label, and adjusts level based on streaks and hint usage.
frontend/src/game/hints.ts: Tracks daily hint usage with a limit and provides remaining‑hint querying and recording.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/numberMatrix.t: Generates a 4x4 Latin-square‑style puzzle, validates user input, and provides hints by revealing the next empty cell.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/patternMatch.t: Builds simple shape or color pattern‑matching puzzles, checks the selected option, and offers direct answer hints.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/registry.ts: Maps a date-based seed to one of the available puzzle types.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/sequenceSolver: Creates number-sequence puzzles with missing values, validates answers, and reveals the next blank as a hint.
frontend/src/game/puzzles/types.ts: Defines shared interfaces for puzzle instances, validation results, and hint structures.
frontend/src/game/renderers/NumberMatrix: Renders the Number Matrix puzzle as an editable grid and handles numeric input updates.
frontend/src/game/renderers/PatternMatch: Displays a pattern sequence with multiple-choice options and tracks the selected answer.
frontend/src/game/renderers/PuzzleRender: Chooses the correct puzzle view, manages user input, validation, hints, scoring, and reset actions.
frontend/src/game/renderers/SequenceSolv: Shows a numeric sequence with blanks and captures user inputs for missing positions.
frontend/src/game/scoring.ts: Calculates final puzzle scores based on hints used and optional timed-mode bonuses.
frontend/src/game/sharing.ts: Encodes and decodes shareable puzzle payloads using base64 JSON.
frontend/src/game/streaks.ts: Computes daily play streaks by comparing completion dates to today and prior days.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalGameState.ts: Manages local game state such as daily progress, streaks, settings, hints, achievements, and heatmap data with associated update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a leaderboard fetch hook using react-query and an actor to load leaderboard data remotely.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI styling.
frontend/src/leaderboard/queries.ts: Provides an online-aware leaderboard query that falls back to cached IndexedDB data when offline or on fetch failure.
frontend/src/lib/dateSeed.ts: Generates date keys, converts them to numeric seeds, and computes the past 365 days for game logic.
frontend/src/lib/prng.ts: Implements a seeded PRNG with methods for generating numbers and shuffling arrays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AchievementsPage.tsx: Displays a list of achievements and their unlocked status using UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing today's puzzle status, current streak, and a 365‑day activity heatmap.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows the daily leaderboard with online/offline handling and optional identity-based sign‑in for score submission.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzlePage.tsx: Renders the daily or shared puzzle, manages progress, completion, timed mode, and share-link generation with dialogs and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays account, gameplay, and difficulty settings with Internet Identity login and toggles for timed mode.
frontend/src/storage/db.ts: Provides localStorage and IndexedDB helpers for async and sync data retrieval and persistence.
frontend/src/storage/models.ts: Defines TypeScript models for daily records, settings, and queued score submissions.
frontend/src/storage/repo.ts: Implements CRUD helpers for daily records, settings, achievements, and queued submissions using local storage.
frontend/src/sync/scoreQueue.ts: Retries submitting queued scores to the backend actor and clears the queue on success.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, plugins, animations, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architecture notes, features, and state versioning for Logic Looper.
